heading: HB01503
0: AN ACT REFORMING THE ADMINISTRATION OF THE JUDICIARY DEVELOPMENT FUND, MANDATING TRANSPARENCY AND ACCOUNTABILITY IN THE ADMINISTRATION THEREOF, TRANSFERRING THE ADMINISTRATION THEREOF FROM THE SUPREME COURT TO THE BUREAU OF THE TREASURY, ENACTING APPROPRIATE AUDIT AND REPORTORIAL REQUIREMENTS THEREFOR, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE PRESIDENTIAL DECREE NO. 1949 AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES

House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01503
